senses.sense_definition: A person who stops someone and forces them to listen to a long conversation against their will.

examples.text: I tried to leave the party, but a persistent <w>buttonholer</w> kept me in the corner for an hour.
He is such a <w>buttonholer</w> that people often cross the street to avoid speaking to him.

senses.sense_definition: An attachment for a sewing machine that automatically moves the fabric to sew a buttonhole.

examples.text: She attached the <w>buttonholer</w> to her machine to finish the shirt professionally.
Using an automatic <w>buttonholer</w> saves a lot of time when making clothes.
